text: John Wentworth (March 5, 1815 â€“ October 16, 1888) was an American politician. He was the Mayor of Chicago two times. Wentworth was born on March 5, 1815 in Sandwhich, New Hampshire. He studied at Dartmouth College. He was married to Roxanna Marie Loomis. Wentworth died on October 16, 1888 in Chicago, Illinois, aged 73. ==References== ==Other websites== * John Wentworth, "First Inaugural Address", Chicago Public Library * John Wentworth, "Second Inaugural Address", Chicago Public Library Category:1815 births Category:1888 deaths Category:Mayors of Chicago Category:Burials at Rosehill Cemetery Category:United States representatives from Illinois Category:Politicians from New Hampshire Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: John Wentworth
